title: FS: Looking to sell PSA 7, 7.5's, 8's, and some 9's
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: Looking to sell PSA 7, 7.5's, 8's, and some 9's
posts.post_content: If you are a set builder, please let me know what your needs are in these grades. I have many available (especially 7's and 7'5's). I also have a lot of extremely tough cards in very high grade, Gandil, Chase, Lindaman, etc....I am aggressively looking to sell in the next few weeks....
